title: Fringe, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread (silver strips on silk core)
Technique: woven
description: Fringe with a silver thread heading in a lozenge design with looped and twisted silver skirt threads. Each supports a tuft of red, blue, green or yellow floss.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fringe, 17th century.Medium: silk, metallic thread (silver strips on silk core)
Technique: woven. 1905-2-210.
